item.title: Concord Has Effectively Been Shut Down By Sony For A Second Time
item.content:encoded:
Concord has gone down in infamy as an all-time Sony and PlayStation blunder. It‚Äôs also understandable that the company wants to sweep the game‚Äôs existence under the rug, which is why Sony has presumably and swiftly issued DMCAs notices to gameplay videos of a fan-inspired Concord reboot, causing access to the game to be halted.

We don‚Äôt think much needs to be said about Concord at this point. The live-service shooter apparently cost over $400 million to develop, the team behind it was quickly shut down by Sony, and PlayStation took Concord offline within days of launch.

Now, a community effort to resurrect the game has been met with strong action.

Sony Issues DMCAs To Concord PC Revival

We reported on November 14 that Concord got a playable fan-made revival on PC. Users cleverly managed to get custom Concord servers up and running‚Äîrequiring special access to let you play.

What seemed like innocent fun has quickly turned into the gaze of Sony being cast upon them.

A dev post in the Concord Delta Discord updated everyone on a serious development:

‚ÄúDue to worrying legal action we‚Äôve decided to pause invites for the time being.‚Äù

It transpires that gameplay videos of the Concord project had made their way to YouTube. DMCA action was immediately imposed by MarkScan‚Äîa name that works a lot on Sony‚Äôs behalf. If you add the facts up, it‚Äôs fairly obvious to see what‚Äôs happened.

As a result, the Concord PC project and servers are on hold, and unless something drastic changes, it probably means Sony is once again responsible for the death of Concord.

Is it better that we all move on from Concord at this point? Or is it a shame to see a handful of people who cared about the short-lived shooter have their hard work up in flmaes? The Insider Gaming Discord Server is the perfect place to share your thoughts.

For more IG gaming news, check out Black Ops 7‚Äôs Day One Steam Numbers Comparing Badly To Battlefield 6 And ARC Raiders, and the First Legend of Zelda Movie Footage Leaking.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Season 1‚ÄîRelease Period, All New Maps, Zombies Content & More
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 begins another 12-month content crusade. New maps, guns, game modes, Operators, events, and all the usual hullabaloo that comes with a new CoD season. We have the latest Black Ops 7 Season 1 release information, as well as the known S1 content.

You could argue that this hasn‚Äôt been the most hyped CoD in history‚ÄîSteam player numbers would agree. Nevertheless, thousands of players have dived into Black Ops 7, meaning that Season 1 will have its fair share of recruits. If you want to know when BLOPS 7 Season 1 starts, read on for the crucial pointers.

Also, if you haven‚Äôt picked up the game yet, or you intend to, we have the cheapest way to buy Black Ops 7.

Expected Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 Release Date

We expect Black Ops 7 Season 1 to kick off on December 4, because it coincides with the end of Black Ops 6 Season 6‚ÄîSignaling the transition from Black Ops 6‚Äôs seasonal content ending and Black Ops 7‚Äôs beginning.

If you‚Äôve been in the live-service loop before, you know the drill. Once a previous season ends, the next one begins. BLOPS 7 has a brief period between launch and Season 1 called the ‚Äòpreseason‚Äô.

We know for sure that the legendary Nuketown map is a big addition in the preseason period. Once we cross this barrier, it‚Äôs time to move on to Season 1. Treyarch is likely to confirm the Season 1 start date in the coming days, but don‚Äôt be surprised to see December 4 as the official start date!

Expected Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 Start Time

Again, based on existing data, Black Ops 7 Season 1 onlookers can expect the new season to begin around 9 AM PT.

This is a simple case of deduction using the end of the Black Ops 6 Season 6 Battle Pass. It‚Äôs what happens with all Call of Duty seasons, and we expect Season 1 to be no different.

If this isn‚Äôt the case, we‚Äôll update this hub and let you know of any confirmed times, delays, or changes.

All Black Ops 7 Season 1 Multiplayer & Zombies Content

Season 1 introduces a whopping 7 multiplayer maps, 7 weapons, remastered content, new multiplayer modes, new LTMs, Holiday season content, and 3 new Zombies maps.

Where do we begin? Let‚Äôs start with the Zombies content to mix it up.

New Black Ops 7 Season 1 Zombies Content

The Season 1 roadmap has confirmed that Astra Malorum is a new round-based Zombies map‚Äîto add to Ashes of the Damned‚Äîand there will also be two additional Survival maps.

We‚Äôve covered all of this and more in our complete Black Ops 7 Zombies hub.

Zombies fans will be satiated with flesh and fun for the foreseeable future, at least. Knowing Treyarch, there is probably the odd surprise here and there you‚Äôll need to uncover!

New Black Ops 7 Season 1 Multiplayer Content

The main course for most is the multiplayer content. A lot of maps are currently locked in for Season 1, adding to the 18 multiplayer maps that launched with the base game.

Here‚Äôs every confirmed map for Season 1 already:

  • Fate
  • Meltdown
  • Nuketown (Technically a preseason map)
  • Odysseus
  • Standoff (Remaster)
  • Utopia
  • Yakei

Additionally, 7 ‚Äúnew & fan-favorite weapons‚Äù are coming‚Äîincluding the Maddox from Black Ops 4‚Äîand we don‚Äôt quite know what the new game modes and extras entail.

Treyarch will reveal all when the time is right. Stay tuned for more updates on Season 1.

There‚Äôs no doubt that Treyarch is starting strong with Season 1. It‚Äôs being touted as the biggest season ever, and you can see why. There‚Äôs much more to come, and it‚Äôs the first of several BLOPS 7 seasons throughout the year. Tell us what you‚Äôre looking forward to the most in Season 1 and what you want to see after it through our Insider Gaming Official Discord Server.

Also, make sure you check out How to Weapon Prestige in Black Ops 7, How to Skip The Campaign To Play Endgame Mode, and How Long It Takes To Beat The Campaign.

item.title: Can You Delete Your Character in Where Winds Meet? Character Delection, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Where Winds Meet has finally launched worldwide after a long period of only being available in China, and if you‚Äôre keen to restart your journey at any point, we‚Äôve got the details on whether you can delete your character.

Where Winds Meet launched globally on November 14, 2025, after months of being exclusively available within China, and there‚Äôs a staggering amount of content to dig through in the Wuxia open-world adventure.

Regular RPG players will be well accustomed to starting over with a new character, which often requires choosing to delete your progress, and there are some limitations in Where Winds Meet, as we‚Äôve explained here.

Can You Delete Your Character in Where Winds Meet?

There is no option to delete your character in Where Winds Meet, unfortunately, so the process to start again is more lengthy.

While you can customize your character freely at any time from the pause menu, though some customizations, like changing hair color, require specific items, you can‚Äôt choose to wipe clean and start again with a click of the button.

Instead, the only way to start over is to create a new account in the game, and the only way to delete a character, as a result, is by deleting your account.

How to Delete Your Account in Where Winds Meet

If you want to delete your account, and therefore your character, in Where Winds Meet, the process is fairly straightforward.

However, it does require creating a new account in the game if you want to start your journey again, and you will lose everything you have earned.

Due to this, some in-game rewards may not be able to be claimed again, if they have already been revealed on your account. While you may be able to redeem them again with a new account, you may be stuck if the redemption is tied to your email address‚Äîunless you use an alternative.

Here‚Äôs the step-by-step process of how to delete your account in where Winds Meet.

  1. Open the game through the launcher.
  2. In the log-in screen, select the profile icon on the left-hand side to open log-in credentials.
  3. Click on the ‚ÄòAccount Deletion‚Äô option.
  4. On the webpage that pops up, click the checkbox to agree to the conditions stated, and click ‚ÄòNext.‚Äô
  5. Click ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô on the pop-up that appears.
  6. Fill in the steps to verify account ownership, and add your contact email.
  7. Click ‚ÄòYes‚Äô on the next pop-up.
  8. On the final page, check the box for the agreement, and hit ‚ÄòSubmit‚Äô to delete your account.

How are you finding Where Winds Meet? Let us know your thoughts on the game in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Where Winds Meet, check out all the Exchange Codes available for additional rewards, and find out all the multiplayer details for the game.

item.title: When Is Nuketown Coming To Black Ops 7? Release Date, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 has one of the biggest launch offerings of maps in history. Despite this, players are still desperate for Nuketown to arrive to make Camo challenges easier and create anarchy, and we have its Black Ops 7 release date.

Nuketown is arguably the most famous CoD map, other than maybe Rust. Its iconic nuclear testing ground setup immediately became a fan-favorite, and its popularity only grew with easter eggs. There‚Äôs the mannequin easter egg, and the fact that you can drive an RC-XD from one end of the map to the other OUTSIDE the confines of the map!

There are other reasons why Nuketown is so beloved. If you‚Äôre desperate to see the Black Ops 7 mockup, we‚Äôve got Nuketown‚Äôs release date and what to expect.

Nuketown Map Release Date In Black Ops 7

Nuketown arrives in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 on November 20, coming as part of the preseason content.

Shipment and Nuketown usually drop in Season 1 of a new CoD title. However, Treyarch knows what players like, and they like a nasty shootout on Nuketown. It‚Äôs great for weapon boosting because of its size, it‚Äôs a kill-haven because of the Scorestreaks potential, and it‚Äôs also the perfect map to expedite the multiplayer camo grind process.

A Call of Duty blog discussed the game‚Äôs launch maps. It has a lot of them, as we‚Äôve said, but it made it clear to comment on Nuketown:

‚ÄúPrior to Season 01, where Black Ops 7 will be delivering the largest number of new and returning 6v6 maps in Call of Duty history, expect 16 signature 6v6 Multiplayer maps to be available at launch, along with two larger-scale Skirmish Maps, and the arrival of Nuketown 2025 in the Preseason on November 20, just after launch.‚Äú

You‚Äôve only got a few days to wait for Nuketown. Then we can unpack any new and returning easter eggs on the map. If you‚Äôve still not got it yet, here‚Äôs where you can buy Black Ops 7 for very cheap.

Why Didn‚Äôt Nuketown Launch With Black Ops 7?

The reason Nuketown didn‚Äôt launch with Black Ops 7 is presumably so that players would try out and experience the rest of the game‚Äôs maps first.

If you don‚Äôt know, the camo grind is a big deal for many players. It‚Äôs the lifeblood of a year-long Call of Duty journey. Plus, for Black Ops 7‚Äîand Warzone‚Äîpurposes, leveling up guns is important.

An easier way to do this is with smaller maps, featuring more kill opportunities, more points scored, and more XP. Players tend to gravitate to Nuketown and Shipment each year to get this done, and will focus on newer, smaller maps: Look at Stakeout in Black Ops 6 as a prime example.

We‚Äôd wager Treyarch wanted some love and attention for the new maps in Black Ops 7 before a majority of the player base makes themselves comfortable in Nuketown for the next few weeks!

Are you already looking forward to Nuketown arriving in Black Ops 7? What is it about the map that keeps you coming back? Let us know through the Insider Gaming Discord Server, where daily gaming discussions are all the rage.

We have many more Black Ops 7 guides: How to Weapon Prestige in Black Ops 7, How to Skip Black Ops 7 Campaign & Play Endgame Mode, and How Long To Beat The Black Ops 7 Campaign.

item.title: Arena Breakout Team Mocks Escape from Tarkov in Deleted Social Post
item.content:encoded:
In a recent post on social media, the team behind Arena Breakout: Infinite, once accused of plagiarising Escape from Tarkov, has mocked Battlestate Games‚Äô 1.0 launch of the spearhead extraction shooter. The post poked fun at Escape from Tarkov‚Äôs ongoing server issues, but shortly after being published, it was removed by MoreFun‚Äôs social media team.

The comments under the post were scathing, with many slamming Arena Breakout: Infinite‚Äôs lacklustre platform, dwindling player base, and lack of any real impact on the genre.

ABI Takes on BSG in X Post

Arena Breakout: Infinite launched on Steam two months ago, ‚Äòbeating Tarkov to the punch‚Äô and pulling in new players, with the game peaking at around 66,000 players on the platform. In the minutes since Escape from Tarkov debuted on Steam, a peak of 21,000 players was secured amidst launch issues preventing many from accessing the game.

In a now-deleted post on social media, Arena Breakout: Infinite mocked Escape from Tarkov‚Äôs server concerns:

Within minutes, the post had been removed, likely under the weight of all the comments ripping into MoreFun Studios and Arena Breakout: Infinite. One user wrote, ‚ÄòI like your game, but this constant slamming of Tarkov on Twitter is shameful and puts your game in a bad light.‚Äô Another wrote, ‚ÄòABI community is so focused on being better than Tarkov, it‚Äôs a total joke.‚Äô

Another fetched receipts from Twitch, calling up some viewership figures: ‚ÄòLook at the Twitch figures ‚Äì 300k people still prefer to sit watching a menu vs. 3,000 playing ABI.‚Äô

Arena Breakout: Infinite came under fire in 2024 when Battlestate Games accused MoreFun Studios of ripping off assets and plagiarising Escape from Tarkov. I caught up with MoreFun Studios at Gamescom to grill them on that very topic.

Escape from Tarkov‚Äôs 1.0 launch is a phenomenal milestone for the Russian developer. It marks the end of ten years of painstaking development that has reshaped the face of the extraction shooter genre over and over again.

Do you think Arena Breakout: Infinite‚Äôs team was right to make a joke at Battlestate Games‚Äô expense? Let me know your thoughts on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Escape from Tarkov‚Äôs servers were boosted, to no avail

item.title: Kirby Air Riders Release Date Explained‚ÄîExact Release Date & Start Times Confirmed
item.content:encoded:
It‚Äôs quite fun for something like Kirby Air Riders to be coming out in 2025, and we‚Äôve got its full release date details, as well as news on its start times and when you can properly wait for the chequered flag to drop.

When you think of racing games on Nintendo Switch, you default to Mario Kart, without question. You might have to rethink this impulse with the launch of Kirby Air Riders. It‚Äôs an unexpected sequel over 20 years in the making, and Kirby has decided to take to the track after a trip through a Forbidden Kingdom.

For all your much-needed Kirby Air Riders release information, you‚Äôve come to the right place.

When Is Kirby Air Riders Coming Out?

Kirby Air Riders is expected to release on November 20, barring any last-minute delays or complications.

Switch 2 owners can get suited up and drive off on November 20. Nintendo games are usually very reliable, where release dates due to the company‚Äôs persistence in perfection. You never know in this day and age, so brace yourself for any late red flags to interrupt your plans.

You can play the game early, too, through the Kirby Air Riders Global Test Ride demo. It gives you a final chance to try out the game before launch, which will likely boost the game‚Äôs sales.

It‚Äôs expected there won‚Äôt be much DLC, and there might not be another sequel. So, expect a very full and jam-packed Kirby Air Riders to keep you occupied for a while.

Kirby Air Riders Start Times

Like most Nintendo first-party games, we expect Kirby Air Riders to be added to the eShop at 7 AM PT on November 20. This is when you can download, install, and play Kirby Air Riders.

This information comes from Nintendo itself. Again, not everything is iron-clad, and there could be some changes. We‚Äôd say to go on the assumption that the time is accurate.

That said, here are the Kirby Air Riders release dates and times in key regions.

Which region applies to you? Are there any you‚Äôd like us to add to our release hubs moving forward? Let us know here, and through the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Make sure you know If You Can Play Kirby Air Riders On Switch 1.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Day One Steam Numbers Compare Badly To Battlefield 6 And ARC Raiders
item.content:encoded:
The first full day of Black Ops 7 is behind us. Its reception has been fairly mixed so far, but one thing that‚Äôs not up for debate is how Black Ops 7 has performed on Steam, especially compared to other big-time shooters right now, such as Battlefield 6 and ARC Raiders.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7‚Äôs release means Treyarch has had back-to-back launches. Black Ops 6 was quite the success, but Black Ops 7 isn‚Äôt being as warmly received. Criticism has come its way due to AI Claims and the fact that you can‚Äôt pause the Black Ops 7 campaign, ever.

With so many eyes on Battlefield 6 and ARC Raiders, it‚Äôs fair to say Black Ops 7 isn‚Äôt the shooter in the spotlight like it wants to be.

Black Ops 7 Falls Way Short Of ARC Raiders & Battlefield 6 On Steam

Let‚Äôs break this down for you. According to SteamDB, Battlefield hit a 24-hour release day peak of 747,440 players, whereas ARC Raiders managed a more than respectable 264,673.

Black Ops 7 is part of the whole ‚ÄòCall of Duty‚Äô banner under SteamDB, making its numbers slightly inflated if anything. However, its 24-hour launch peak on November 14 hit a high of 86,652 players.

It‚Äôs bad enough if you compare ARC Raider and Black Ops 7. When you do a direct comparison between Battlefield 6 and Black Ops 7, you need to stop the count! Worryingly for CoD, Battlefield 6 is still regularly hitting 200-250K, and ARC Raiders is growing stronger‚Äîconsistently breaking 300K.

It‚Äôs expected that the weekend might give Black Ops 7 a boost, but it remains to be seen by how much. Even with Season 1 expected to be the biggest ever, for a franchise that regularly scoops the award for best-selling game of the year, this year might be a rude awakening for Call of Duty.

Have you bought Black Ops 7? Or are you on either the Battlefield 6 or ARC Raiders hype train this year? Share your thoughts on the shooter debate through the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

You should also check out How to Skip The Black Ops 7 Campaign To Play Endgame early, and How Long It Takes To Beat The Game, if you do.

item.title: First The Legend of Zelda Movie Footage Has Reportedly Leaked
item.content:encoded:
Given the history and prestige of The Legend of Zelda, a proper movie is something that‚Äôs needed. There‚Äôs also the biggest weight of expectation imaginable on its shoulders. So, anyone desperate for details on The Legend of Zelda movie might be interested to know that the first footage has reportedly leaked.

In 2023, we finally learned that The Legend of Zelda was getting a movie. It received a release date soon after, but it was inevitably delayed‚Äîas all things are. After wondering where the movie had gone, it was rumored that the movie had seemingly started filming in November 2025. Not long after, secret footage surfaced.

The Legend of Zelda Movie Video Leaks Appear Online

Instagram account josh.and.pine has shared several videos supposedly showing the first The Legend of Zelda Movie set leaks.

The video shows Link on set (in full Green Tunic) speaking to the crew. Soon after, we cut to the actress playing Zelda‚Äîand it also reveals that she‚Äôs wearing a blue outfit closer to the Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom look. A horse is being prepared, and it‚Äôs clearly wearing a patch with the classic Zelda logo in the middle of it.

If that wasn‚Äôt enough to whet your appetite, another leak from what appears to be the sme set has also been revealed. This time, it looks like an actual scene is taking place. tonyolsenfilm shared the other video, and it‚Äôs an extension of the first clip, only this time Zelda is briefly looking around before speaking to another Hylian.

There have been some suggestions that the footage is AI. However, the action isn‚Äôt consistent with the usual AI tropes, such as scenery inconsistencies, the weird AI effect some videos have, and there aren‚Äôt any abnormal occurrences in the footage. This could also be a setup leak to promote the film and gain publicity through alleged leaks.

Either way, unless we hear otherwise, this does look like the first-ever The Legend of Zelda Movie footage. The costumes look good‚Äîalthough this incarnation of Zelda might upset some fans‚Äîand we know that filming is likely underway!

Let us know what you think of the videos. Are you excited to see what a full-length, live-action The Legend of Zelda Movie looks like? You can do so through the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

You should also read about a New Legend of Zelda LEGO Set Coming in 2026.
